subject: Fines (Penalties)
Automobile Racing
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Michael Waltrip’s crew chief and the team’s vice president of competition were ejected from Daytona International Speedway after an illegal additive was discovered during qualifying inspections.
snippet: Michael Waltrip’s crew chief and the team’s vice president of competition were ejected from Daytona International Speedway after an illegal additive was discovered during qualifying inspections.
